wikipedia_page.main: Kevin McCann (born 17 December 1980) is a Scottish former footballer who played for Partick Thistle, Dumbarton and East Stirlingshire.

response: Findlay was replaced by Graham McLaren, who was in turn shown the red card when he fouled Charles McLean inside the box to concede a penalty kick. Kevin McCann took over and tipped McLean's penalty effort over the crossbar.
Kevin McCann is the name of:
